name: Lost Myths: Sons of Ragnar (VR )
description:
THE PROTOTYPE

In this narrative game, with 3 levels available, you can discover the Saga of Ragnar Lothbrok and his sons, explore the wilderness and interact with the world around you. Let yourself be charmed by our ethereal narrator and beautiful landscapes from the days gone by. Experience the life of a Viking with artefacts they once used in their daily lives

MUSIC

The music of the game is inspired by the few existing archaeological traces and Nordic Folk Music.

FURTHER DEVELOPMENT

We are improving movements and gameplay. The game will evolve  little by little to an adventure game with:

  • Puzzles
  • More levels and interactions with the environments
  • Main quest and side quests
  • Even more story
  • PC and Oculus Quest version
  • DLC

Your feedbacks are welcome and precious to help us making the game evolve! Feel free to share your thoughts with us on this page or our Discord ;)
